textList.text: You have arrived in the peaceful sector. 1

event.text: You notice the guard at this beacon, but they pay you no mind.

event.name: GUARD_PEACEFUL_INTERACT
event.text: You approach the guard carefully, weighing your options. They're already suspicious.

choice.text: Demand they hand over the contents of their storage.
Change your mind and leave the guard alone.

event.text: With the guard already cautious of your movements, you decide its best not to stick around.
The guard refuses your demands and insteads raises its weapons!

The guard is reluctant, but hands over a portion of their storage. However, as you are gathering the goods they raise their weapons and attack!

The guard is reluctant, but hands over a large portion of their storage. They try to attack you but you flash your weapons again, and they rethink defending the goods, happy to let you go with some scrap and not their heads.
The guard refuses to respond to your hails. You decide its best to leave it alone.
The guard refuses to respond to your hails. You decide its best to leave it alone.
The guard.
The guard's crew apologizes but they tell you they are unable to help in your mission
The guard's crew, happy to see one of their own aboard your ship, offer you a small portion of the rescources in their storage to aid you on your mission.

event.name: GUARD_PEACEFUL_DESTROY
event.text: With the guard destroyed, you're dissapointed to find their storage did not survive the fight. You can't hang around long before reinforcements arrive, so you take whats left of the debris and leave the husk of the ship behind.
A nearby ASB satellite registers the Guard's distress signal and targets your ship!

choice.text: [ASB Jammer] Disable the ASB satellites before they can target your ship.

event.text: The jammer works like a charm, and the satellites never once lock onto your ship. We still shouldn't stick around, but now you have some extra time to scrap the guard.

event.name: GUARD_PEACEFUL_KILL
event.text: With the crew dead, the storage is yours. You find some sort of unique [REWARD TYPE HERE], which you take along with any extra scrap or rescources. You can't stick around long to scrap the hull of the ship before reinforcements arrive, but you're satisfied with what you have.

event.text: The guard hails you. "You are not welcome here!"
You hope this is enough to satisfy them...

choice.text: (Mind Control) Attempt to mind control them.
(Mantis) Try to persuade them to let you go.
(Adv Engines) Try to escape the guard.
(Adv Autopilot) Activate the auto-pilot to try and escape.

event.text: "Flattering. I wonder what else you might have in your storage..." Uh oh...

The guard seems satisfied with the bribe. "I guess you can pass... for now."
Your tricks are not enough to effect the guards, and it only seems to anger them!

"Oh pardon me, how rude of us. Here, take some of this as a show of our well-being. Have a great day!"
"One of us? On your ship? How disgusting. A traitor! I'll enjoy scrubbing your ship clean of the scum."

"What madness are you spewing? A covert mission on a fake federation ship? Well... that does sound rather important. Alright, I'll let you pass for now, but you better hope we dont cross paths again."
